channel.title: Object Requirements help [Pi]
channel.description:
Ok so my skillcapes are messed up so i was going to set it so u need 99 to wear them, so i went to ItemAssistant.java put this [code] case 9748: // Skillcape c.attackLevelReq = 99; return;[/code]
I logged in to see if it worked and i can still wear the cape at level 1 so idk what i did wrong

item.title: Object Requirements help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

case 9748: // Skillcape if(c.playerLevel[1] >= 99) return; else if (c.playerLevel[1] <= 98) c.sendMessage("You must have an Attack Level of 99 to wear this!"); break;

Try that.

Read full topic
